full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GRUB MTHA' SMRA BA BZHI'I GZHI LAM 'BRAS GSUM GYI BZHED TSUL SO SOR YOD PA LAS BDEN GNYIS LAS BRTZAMS TE GZHI'I 'DOD TSUL TZAM BKOD PA DPYOD LDAN MGUB BSKYED PA'I RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B ('DI YANG TSE MCHOG GLING YONGS 'DZIN MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE RJE 'JAM DPAL YE SHES BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO NAS, KHAL KHA KHU RE CHEN MO'I GRVA RIGS RAB 'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN LA GNANG BA YIN NO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BSTAN YUN RING DU GNAS SHING 'GRO KUN BSHES GNYEN DAM PAS RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,) AOm SVASTI, BLO GSAR RNAMS LA NYE BAR MKHO BA YI, ,GRUB MTHA'I RNAM BZHAG TSIGS SU BCAD MA DANG, BSLAB TSIG DANG BCAS PAR DU BZHENGS PA PO, ,SPAR DPON DGE SLONG BLO BZANG @013A *, ,TSE RING STE, DGE BAS RGYAL BSTAN YUN RING GNAS PA DANG, ^ DAM PA'I ZHABS BRTAN CHOS GRVA RNAM GNYIS KYI, ,DGE 'DUN THUGS MTHUN KHRIMS GTZANG BKA' PO TA LNGA'I, , 'CHAD NYAN YAR NGO'I ZLA LTAR 'PHEL RGYAS SHOG ,(CES PA 'DI YANG BRAN NGAG GI DBANG POS BRIS PA LAGS , ,PAR 'DI KHU RE CHEN MO'I KUN DGA' CHOS GLING GRVA TSANG DU BZHUGS, ,DGE'O, ,)
